Introduction
This topic contains general information on concurrent FEC and VA benefit payments, including
definitions of
FEC
, and
same disability or death
restrictions on the concurrent payment of FEC and VA benefits
, and
concurrent payment of FEC and
vocational rehabilitation/employment (VR&E) benefits
, and
Dependents' Educational Assistance (DEA)
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 5 - Federal Employees’ Compensation (FEC)
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section None
